name: Crowns and Kings
body:
# Crowns And Kings Official Game Site

Welcome to the official website of Crowns and Kings, the open world karma system based game. We will be updating this page as the development of the game progresses.


This website is still being worked on, so expect to this change quite a bit.




The game runs on Unity 5 in C#, and is set for release in 2019


## Â© DevTek Studios 2016
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
